job_details.Functieomschrijving:
* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_details.full_text:
Software Engineer - GenAI Platform Development

* Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
     * Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
     * Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
     * Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
     * Support and mentor other engineers, contributing to a culture that values technical skill and code quality.
     * Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description heavily emphasizes developing GenAI services, integrating them into products, and optimizing them for performance. It also mentions collaboration and mentoring, aligning with the core responsibilities of a GenAI Engineer focused on building and deploying AI-powered applications.

phrases: Contribute to the development of GenAI services that are integral to our product offerings and user experiences.
Implement coding best practices to foster code modularity, reusability, and maintainability, enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem, ensuring a smooth developer experience.
Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
job_tasks.justification: These phrases directly relate to building, integrating, and maintaining software applications, specifically those incorporating AI services, which is the core of Software Development in this context.

phrases: Contribute to the development of GenAI services
Assess and optimize existing AI services
job_tasks.justification: The mention of 'GenAI services' and the need to 'optimize existing AI services' implies working with and potentially fine-tuning or adapting generative AI models.

phrases: Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance and conform to the latest industry trends.
job_tasks.justification: Optimizing services for performance and ensuring they conform to industry trends suggests a focus on production-level maintenance and improvement, which falls under Operations Engineering.

phrases: integral to our product offerings and user experiences
integrate AI services into the wider product ecosystem
job_tasks.justification: These phrases indicate an understanding of how the AI services connect to the company's products and user needs, demonstrating business context awareness.

phrases: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly speaks to the need for continuous learning and adapting to new technologies.

soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on collaboration with other teams and ensuring a good developer experience highlights the need for effective communication and teamwork.

phrases: Stay informed on the latest AI technologies and programming techniques, exploring their applicability to our services.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase directly indicates the requirement for continuous learning and adapting to new AI technologies.

phrases: Assess and optimize existing AI services to enhance performance
soft_skills.justification: Assessing and optimizing services for performance requires analytical and problem-solving skills to identify and implement improvements.

phrases: Contribute to the development of GenAI services
enabling our AI services to remain flexible for future advancements.
exploring their applicability to our services.
soft_skills.justification: The focus on developing new GenAI services, ensuring future flexibility, and exploring new technologies suggests a proactive and ownership-driven approach.
No specific phrases in the job description directly address ethical or legal responsibilities related to AI.
